Class MiniRustCompiler

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class MiniRustCompiler
extends java.lang.Object
    Implement a compiler for MiniRust Language.
    Grammar of this language can be found here.
    Author:
    Frosqh

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Compile the file passed in argument.
        Exit Code : 5 -> Error while parsing
        Exit Code : 6 -> Error on semantic controls
        Parameters:
        args - args[0] : file path
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If error on opening FileStream
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        parseTree(CommonTree, TDS, boolean, boolean), genCode(CommonTree, TDS, String)

                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Generate the PIUP code corresponding to AST and associated Symbol Table
        Parameters:
        t - AST to parse
        tds - Associated Symbol Table
        output - Path to save code output
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:

      • parseTree

        static void parseTree(org.antlr.runtime.tree.CommonTree t,
                      TDS tds,
                      boolean b,
                      boolean fromScope)
        Parse the tree to build the Symbol Table
        Parameters:
        t - Tree to parse
        tds - Current state of Symbol Table
        b - Is it a new scope ?
        fromScope - Is it is called for a control purpose ?
        See Also:
        TDS.add(BaseTree, boolean)
